subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Alderson, the team’s general manager, took over before the 2011 season and is working with the Mets toward a three-year deal, according to a person with knowledge of the negotiations.
snippet: Alderson, the team’s general manager, took over before the 2011 season and is working with the Mets toward a three-year deal, according to a person with knowledge of the negotiations.
